title: Do you think the facts told about black holes are true in the following videos? - Quora

response.answer_text: Those videos are just poorly pirated episodes of strip cosmos and how the universe works just the intro of video was made by them. so, in conclusion just ignore intro of video and rest info is quite trustable. if you have seen those episodes of how the universe works as many times as i did then you will begin to recognize voice of narrator like i do :)
Ya it is trustable, coz’ this are clips of “How the universe works” a show of Discovery Science in India. So they are true 🙂.
